ComicInfo.Series: George R.R. Martin's A Clash of Kings
ComicInfo.Summary:
Amidst the freezing cold beyond the wall, Jon Snow meets the wildling Ygritte and learns the Song of the Winter Rose. Meanwhile, Theon Greyjoy, fresh from conquering Winterfell, awakens to the disappearance of his hostages, Bran and Rickon. War is coming soon, as Dynamite Entertainment once again brings to life another exciting chapter of George R. R. Martinâ€™s epic fantasy series - A Song of Ice and Fire!
